card2.paragraph1: Full-stack developer with more than {myExperience} years of experience in custom application/software development.
card2.paragraph2: These are some of the technologies I have used in my projects:
card2.paragraph4: Although I have tools and technologies that I handle more, I like to learn new ones, to improve my knowledge and use the best for each project.
card3.paragraph1: If you have a project, an idea that you want to carry out or just want to talk, do not hesitate to contact me.
